assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: The authors report no conflicts of interest.

assertion.value: An IRB review was deemed not necessary from each individual institution.

assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: The authors have received and archived informed written consent for participation and publication of patient photos (from those families in Fig. InternalRef removed) and for publication of variant and clinical data (from all families) was obtained from their parents or legal guardians.

assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: The authors attest that results are presented clearly, honestly, and without fabrication, falsification or inappropriate data manipulation (including image based manipulation).
